aka: When Johan Johanaš disappeared to the mountains
trans_title: When Johan Johanaš disappeared to the mountains
introduction: Máttáráhká is a story about a woman searching for her strength in a world of predators. Máret is a filmmaker living in a conservative world where predators are ever-present, blood is everywhere, and silence is golden. Máret refuses to conform to the traditional female role of her community and dreams of escaping to Europe, leaving behind the rapists and lovers.
